text: Javad Ashkaref (; born July 27, 1988) is an Iranian weightlifting official and sports administrator. He currently serves as the Vice President of the Weightlifting Board of Mazandaran Province, a position he has held since 2018. == Early life == Ashkaref was born in Chamestan, a district in Nur County, Mazandaran Province, Iran. He has been involved in the sport of weightlifting both as an athlete and an administrator. == Career == Since 2018, Ashkaref has been the Vice President of the Mazandaran Provincial Weightlifting Board. In this role, he has helped organize regional competitions and training programs, and is known for supporting young athletes in the province. == Physical characteristics == * Height: 175 cm * Weight: 100 kg == Related pages == * Iran Weightlifting Federation * Mazandaran Province * Weightlifting in Iran == References == Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:Iranian weightlifters Category:Iranian sportspeople == Other websites == *
title: Javad Ashkaref
